item.title: Why Are We Members of the Only True Church?
item.description:
Why Are We Members of the Only True Church? by Elder Enrique R. Falabella, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Morning of 177th Semiannual General Conference on Sun Sep 30 2007
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Enrique R. Falabella, Of the Seventy

item.title: The Home: The School of Life
item.description:
The Home: The School of Life by Elder Enrique R. Falabella, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 183rd Annual General Conference on Sun Mar 31 2013
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
